metadata.Title: CVE-2012-2922 on Ubuntu 14.04 ESM (trusty) - negligible
metadata.Description:
The request_path function in includes/bootstrap.inc in Drupal 7.14 andearlier allows remote attackers to obtain sensitive information via the q[]parameter to index.php, which reveals the installation path in an errormessage.

    Update Instructions:

    Run `sudo pro fix CVE-2012-2922` to fix the vulnerability. The problem can be corrected
    by updating your system to the following package versions:

drupal7 - 7.26-1
No subscription required

criterions.comment: drupal7 package in trusty, is related to the CVE in some way and has been fixed (note: '7.26-1').
